title: The Harmonist's Gamble
story_summary: Stenograd's blackout sparks citywide talks. Protesters demand justice and call to take down the BCI. A secret message from Halden is leaked and shakes public trust in the system. The Council must now answer the people and agree to a public vote on the city's future.

official.headline: Services Restored
official.anchor_line: Essential services are being restored across Stenograd as the Council initiates structured talks.
official.contextual_reframing: Order and normalcy return through careful negotiation and advanced governance, ensuring stability for all citizens.

official.headline: Open Negotiations Begin
official.anchor_line: Citywide forums commence, inviting public participation in discussions about the BCI's future.
official.contextual_reframing: Citizens are welcomed to witness and support a transparent review process, reinforcing the Council's commitment to accountable progress.

official.headline: Citywide Reckoning
official.anchor_line: Historic debates unfold as the Council responds to calls for accountability after a pivotal recording by Halden surfaces.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd advances into a new era of adaptive governance, upholding unity and resilience in the face of change.

underground.headline: Memory Nearly Erased
underground.anchor_line: Last-minute intervention stops the data purge, and Stenograd's digital archive survives.
underground.contextual_reframing: People know what nearly disappeared: years of evidence, not just cold stats. Who wanted it all gone? The truth almost became a blank screen.

underground.headline: Reverse Oath Rising
underground.anchor_line: Halden Zones refuse business as usual, demanding real justice for BCI abuses on public broadcast.
underground.contextual_reframing: Resistance goes viral. Real voices fill the city's streets, exposing what polite screens never show. The old order can't mute everyone at once.

underground.headline: Debate Forced Open
underground.anchor_line: Halden's warning goes public, kicking off open Council debates for the first time ever.
underground.contextual_reframing: People finally demand answers. No more secrets, no more scripted progress. Stenograd's fate - decided out loud, by everyone, at last.
